description: Check the health of a puppet agent

target_runinterval.description: What should the agent run interval be set to? (Defaults to 1800 seconds)

target_noop_state.description: What should the agent noop state be set to? (Defaults to false)

target_use_cached_catalog_state.description: What should the agent use_cached_catalog state be set to? (Defaults to false)

target_service_enabled.description: Should the puppet service be enabled? (Defaults to true)

target_service_running.description: Should the puppet service be running? (Defaults to 'running')
